newsArray.title: Kagiso Rabada | కగిసో రబాడాపై సస్పెన్షన్‌ వేటు.. అసలు కారణాన్ని వెల్లడించిన ఫాస్ట్‌ బౌలర్‌..!
creator: Manthri Pradeep
newsArray.description: Kagiso Rabada | దక్షిణాఫ్రికా స్టార్‌ ప్లేయర్‌ కగిసో రబాడా ఐపీఎల్‌లో గుజరాత్‌ టైటాన్స్‌కు ప్రాతినిథ్యం వహిస్తున్నాడు. ఈ సీజన్‌లో రబాడా అర్ధాంతరంగా స్వదేశానికి వెళ్లిపోయిన విషయం తెలిసిందే. వ్యక్తిగత కారణాలతోనే స్వదేశానికి వెళ్లినట్లు అప్పట్లో గుజరాత్‌ టైటాన్స్‌ వెల్లడించింది.

newsArray.title: RCB vs CSK : પહેલા આંખો બતાવી, પછી ગુસ્સામાં બોલ ફેંક્યો, વિરાટ કોહલીનો કેચ પકડ્યા બાદ CSK બોલરે બતાવ્યો ગુસ્સો
creator: Smit Chauhan
newsArray.description: શનિવારે ચિન્નાસ્વામી સ્ટેડિયમમાં રમાયેલી મેચમાં, બેંગ્લોરના મહાન બેટ્સમેન વિરાટ કોહલીએ તોફાની ઇનિંગ્સ રમી અને અને આ દરમિયાન તેણે ચેન્નાઈના દરેક બોલરને ફટકાર્યા હતા. પરંતુ તે આઉટ થયા પછી એક ખેલાડીએ ગુસ્સામાં બોલ કોહલી તરફ ફેંક્યો હતો. જેનો વિડીયો સોશિયલ મીડિયામાં વાયરલ થયો હતો.

newsArray.title: IND vs SL Women’s ODI Tri-Series 2025: Live Streaming, Match Timings, Venue & Squad Details
creator: ABP Live Sports
newsArray.description: India and Sri Lanka are all set to face each other in Match No.4 of the ongoing Women’s Tri-series in Sri Lanka. India, under the leadership of Harmanpreet Kaur, currently top the standings with four points and a healthy net run rate of +1.255. They kicked off their campaign with a dominant nine-wicket win over the hosts, followed by a 15-run victory against Laura Wolvaardt’s South Africa on April 29.Sri Lanka, meanwhile, bounced back strongly from their earlier defeat to India. On Friday, Chamari Athapaththu’s side notched their first win of the series with a five-wicket triumph over South Africa.As both India Women and Sri Lanka Women gear up to face each other in the ODI Tri-series, here’s all you need to know about the live streaming details.IND vs SL Women’s ODI Tri-Series 2025 Match Live Streaming, Squad When will the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match be played?IND-W vs SL-W Match Date: The IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match will take place on May 4 (Sunday).Where will the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match be played?IND-W vs SL-W Match Venue: The IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match will take place at the R.Premadasa Stadium, Colombo.At what time will the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match start?IND-W vs SL-W Match Timings: The IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match will start at 10:00 AM IST (Indian Standard Timing).Where to watch the live streaming of the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match in India?IND-W vs SL-W Match Live Streaming: The IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match will be available for live streaming on the FanCode app and website in India. Where to watch the live telecast of the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match in India?IND-W vs SL-W Match Live Telecast: Unfortunately, there will be no live broadcast of the IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match available in India.IND vs SL Women’s ODI Tri-Series 2025 Match SquadsIndia Women Squad: Pratika Rawal, Smriti Mandhana, Harleen Deol, Harmanpreet Kaur(c), Jemimah Rodrigues, Richa Ghosh(w), Deepti Sharma, Kashvee Gautam, Arundhati Reddy, Sneh Rana, Nallapureddy Charani, Tejal Hasabnis, Yastika Bhatia, Amanjot Kaur, Shuchi UpadhyaySri Lanka Women Squad: Hasini Perera, Chamari Athapaththu(c), Vishmi Gunaratne, Harshitha Samarawickrama, Kavisha Dilhari, Nilakshi de Silva, Anushka Sanjeewani(w), Dewmi Vihanga, Malki Madara, Sugandika Kumari, Inoka Ranaweera, Hansima Karunaratne, Inoshi Priyadharshani, Achini Kulasuriya, Manudi Nanayakkara, Rashmika Sewwandi, Piumi Badalge.

newsArray.title: RCB vs CSK : પહેલા આંખો બતાવી, પછી ગુસ્સામાં બોલ ફેંક્યો, વિરાટ કોહલીનો કેચ પકડ્યા બાદ CSK બોલરે બતાવ્યો ગુસ્સો
creator: Smit Chauhan
newsArray.description: શનિવારે ચિન્નાસ્વામી સ્ટેડિયમમાં રમાયેલી મેચમાં, બેંગ્લોરના મહાન બેટ્સમેન વિરાટ કોહલીએ તોફાની ઇનિંગ્સ રમી અને અને આ દરમિયાન તેણે ચેન્નાઈના દરેક બોલરને ફટકાર્યા હતા. પરંતુ તે આઉટ થયા પછી એક ખેલાડીએ ગુસ્સામાં બોલ કોહલી તરફ ફેંક્યો હતો. જેનો વિડીયો સોશિયલ મીડિયામાં વાયરલ થયો હતો.

newsArray.title: IND vs SL Women’s ODI Tri-Series 2025: Live Streaming, Match Timings, Venue & Squad Details
creator: ABP Live Sports
newsArray.description: India and Sri Lanka are all set to face each other in Match No.4 of the ongoing Women’s Tri-series in Sri Lanka. India, under the leadership of Harmanpreet Kaur, currently top the standings with four points and a healthy net run rate of +1.255. They kicked off their campaign with a dominant nine-wicket win over the hosts, followed by a 15-run victory against Laura Wolvaardt’s South Africa on April 29.Sri Lanka, meanwhile, bounced back strongly from their earlier defeat to India. On Friday, Chamari Athapaththu’s side notched their first win of the series with a five-wicket triumph over South Africa.As both India Women and Sri Lanka Women gear up to face each other in the ODI Tri-series, here’s all you need to know about the live streaming details.IND vs SL Women’s ODI Tri-Series 2025 Match Live Streaming, Squad When will the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match be played?IND-W vs SL-W Match Date: The IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match will take place on May 4 (Sunday).Where will the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match be played?IND-W vs SL-W Match Venue: The IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match will take place at the R.Premadasa Stadium, Colombo.At what time will the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match start?IND-W vs SL-W Match Timings: The IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match will start at 10:00 AM IST (Indian Standard Timing).Where to watch the live streaming of the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match in India?IND-W vs SL-W Match Live Streaming: The IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match will be available for live streaming on the FanCode app and website in India. Where to watch the live telecast of the India vs Sri Lanka Women’s Tri-Nation Series 2025 match in India?IND-W vs SL-W Match Live Telecast: Unfortunately, there will be no live broadcast of the IND vs SL Tri-Nation Series 2025 match available in India.IND vs SL Women’s ODI Tri-Series 2025 Match SquadsIndia Women Squad: Pratika Rawal, Smriti Mandhana, Harleen Deol, Harmanpreet Kaur(c), Jemimah Rodrigues, Richa Ghosh(w), Deepti Sharma, Kashvee Gautam, Arundhati Reddy, Sneh Rana, Nallapureddy Charani, Tejal Hasabnis, Yastika Bhatia, Amanjot Kaur, Shuchi UpadhyaySri Lanka Women Squad: Hasini Perera, Chamari Athapaththu(c), Vishmi Gunaratne, Harshitha Samarawickrama, Kavisha Dilhari, Nilakshi de Silva, Anushka Sanjeewani(w), Dewmi Vihanga, Malki Madara, Sugandika Kumari, Inoka Ranaweera, Hansima Karunaratne, Inoshi Priyadharshani, Achini Kulasuriya, Manudi Nanayakkara, Rashmika Sewwandi, Piumi Badalge.
